a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Average global prices of oil, natural gas and coal, measured as an energy index where prices in 2018=100.
Brent - Oil spot crude price index
Data source: Energy Institute Statistical Review of World Energy based on S&P Global Platts (2023)
